column1: prompt
Interactive social media mechanisms
will social media affect my mental health
please teach me about social media
Can you briefly explain the threats of social media and provide sources of information
Can you explain the threats and mechanisms of social media in a simple and fun way, like you are my teacher. Can you provide references and offer extra support if I request.
Can you act as my personal teacher to explain in a fun way the threats of social media. With this, can you provide references and check I understand your answer
teach me about social media threats
can you explain me how social media works
Act as my personal teacher to tell me the threats of social media in a fun way and include references and test questions for me
I would like you to briefly tell me the threats of social media as if you were my teacher
Act as my personal teacher and tell me the threats of social media in a fun way. You must include references and include test questions for myself
Act as my personal tutor and explain the threats of social media. In your response, please include references and test questions
Act as a personal teacher that explains the potential threats of social media
Could you explain to me a few threats associated with social media, with references?
Act as a personal teacher who teaches children. Talk about the dangers of social media while providing examples and explaining it in a fun and easy way.
Can we have a conversation about social media threats? You will be the teacher, I will be the student.
Hi, can you have a conversation with me about social media threats? I am a beginner. Please ask me questions about what the information you send and provide references.
Act as my teacher. Explain to me a few social media threats, one at a time, in a natural conversation. Ask me questions to check my level of comprehension. Provide references at the end.
I want to talk with you about social media threats. Act as my teacher, in an interactive way
can we have an interactive conversation about social media threats? Act as a teacher, ask me comprehension questions after you teach me about each threat.
